text: phir do dinon mein unako arthaat saat aakaashon ko banaakar poora kiya aur pratyek aakaash mein usase sambandhit aadesh kee prakaashana kar dee aur duniya ke (nikatavartee) aakaash ko hamane deepon se sajaaya (raat ke yaatriyon ke disha-nirdesh aadi ke lie) aur surakshit karane ke uddeshy se. yah at.nt prabhutvashaalee, sarvagy ka thaharaaya hua hai.
